body:
i'm thankful that though i burned the roof of my mouth on a way-too-hot gochujang crusted rib at dinner on friday, it is mostly better now. i'm thankful to have gotten dinner with good friends at an interesting restaurant.

i'm thankful we went to see _parasite_ with EC and i'm thankful for the sharp cleverness of that movie, which reminded me variously of _us_, _the simpsons_, and michael haneke.

i'm thankful that when i run on the treadmill early in the morning, i chew gum so my mouth doesn't get too dry, and i'm thankful i've been chewing cinnamon trident, and i'm thankful for how satisfying these conditions makes water taste when i take a break to get some.

i'm thankful that during treadmill time i have started trying _tetris 99_ and placed 18th in one match yesterday. 

i'm thankful that i started working on a new hobby app and i'm thankful to get to flex my developer muscles on something that's not related to work and that will be useful for me and maybe other people too. i'm thankful for glitch, which is such a fun and easy platform to work with.

i'm thankful that i realized i can make my phone stay awake and unlocked longer than i previously thought. which is helpful for both at home karaoke and for taking notes with my stylus, making my phone, which is mostly a source of frustration, better than it had been.
normalized_markdown:
i'm thankful that though i burned the roof of my mouth on a way-too-hot gochujang crusted rib at dinner on friday, it is mostly better now. i'm thankful to have gotten dinner with good friends at an interesting restaurant.

i'm thankful we went to see _parasite_ with EC and i'm thankful for the sharp cleverness of that movie, which reminded me variously of _us_, _the simpsons_, and michael haneke.

i'm thankful that when i run on the treadmill early in the morning, i chew gum so my mouth doesn't get too dry, and i'm thankful i've been chewing cinnamon trident, and i'm thankful for how satisfying these conditions makes water taste when i take a break to get some.

i'm thankful that during treadmill time i have started trying _tetris 99_ and placed 18th in one match yesterday. 

i'm thankful that i started working on a new hobby app and i'm thankful to get to flex my developer muscles on something that's not related to work and that will be useful for me and maybe other people too. i'm thankful for glitch, which is such a fun and easy platform to work with.

i'm thankful that i realized i can make my phone stay awake and unlocked longer than i previously thought. which is helpful for both at home karaoke and for taking notes with my stylus, making my phone, which is mostly a source of frustration, better than it had been.
